translations.901657216069344601:
Digitally and easily
manage art awards.
translations.3981196953380027327: Effortlessly manage complex, multimedia portfolios, encourage collaborative discussions among jury members with an elegant, integrated chat feature, and ensure impartial and transparent art evaluations.
translations.5656851026366751100:
From application to voting, our tool makes the art prize
                    process seamless and efficient.
translations.4422427709478512616:
Our tool is designed to cater to the needs of both artists and
                jury members, making the art prize process fair and efficient.
translations.5977610304847220983:
Watch our detailed walkthrough video to understand how to use
                  our tool effectively.
translations.4510695153196213729:
Interested? We are happy to provide you with a non-binding offer
                for the setup and integration of the app. Get in touch with us.
translations.2661441261152211391: The email address is badly formatted.
